com.aleozlx.pacswitch

Class PacswitchMessager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aleozlx.pacswitch.PacswitchClient
      • com.aleozlx.pacswitch.PacswitchMessager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacswitchAPI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GatewayMessager

    public class PacswitchMessager
extends PacswitchClient
    Message protocol based on paswitch protocol facilitates both tracked and untracked messages transmission and provide request-response mapping.

    Fork me on github:
    https://github.com/aleozlx/pacscli4java
    And feel free to pay a visit to the server project:
    https://github.com/aleozlx/pacswitch
    Since:
    June 27, 2014
    Version:
    1.3.1
    Author:
    Alex

      • send

        public java.lang.String send(java.lang.String to,
                    java.lang.String message)
                      throws PacswitchException
        Send a tracked message synchronously
        Parameters:
        to - Receiver ID
        message - Message content
        Returns:
        Response from other side
        Throws:
        PacswitchException - When there is an connection error, server down or receiver absence. Refers to the exception message for a specified reason.
